column2: State defines the arts in statute or code as a core or academic subject
column3: State adopted early childhood or prekindergarten arts education standards
column4: State adopted elementary and/or secondary arts education standards
column5: State requires districts or schools to offer arts instruction at the elementary school level
column6: State requires districts or schools to offer arts instruction at the middle school level
column7: State requires districts or schools to offer arts instruction at the high school level
column8: State includes arts courses as an option to fulfill graduation requirements
column9: State requires state-, district- or school-level assessment of student learning in the arts
column10: State specifies arts education as a requirement for schools to be accredited
column11: State provides funding for an arts education grant program or a state-funded school for the arts
